hero.subtitle: This application uses artificial intelligence to support university educators throughout the entire course preparation process. It saves time, brings order to work, and offers inspiring ideas for every lesson.

setupBanner.title: API Key Required
setupBanner.description: To use the AI-powered features of ProfAssistant, you need to provide your own OpenAI API key. Your key is encrypted at rest and is only used to make requests on your behalf.

steps.step1: Go to platform.openai.com and create an account (or log in)
steps.step2: Navigate to API Keys and create a new key
steps.step3: Paste your key below and click Save

apiKey.title: OpenAI API Key
